doc.course_name: Building AI Applications with Watson APIs
doc.course_introduction: A learner will be able to write an application that leverages multiple Watson AI services (Discovery, Speech to Text, Assistant, and Text to Speech). By the end of the course, theyâ€™ll learn best practices of combining Watson services, and how they can build interactive information retrieval systems with Discovery + Assistant.
doc.course_chapter: Module 1: Introduction//Module 2: Watson Discovery//Module 3: Building the Chatbot//Module 4: Giving it a Voice//Module 5: Deployment//Module 6: Project
doc.course_sub_chapter: [['Course Introduction', 'Building AI Applications', 'The Technologies We Are Going to Use'], ['Understanding Watson Discovery', 'Creating a Discovery Collection'], ['Integrating Watson Assistant & Discovery', 'Creating a Chatbot with Watson Assistant', 'Adding Discovery to the Chatbot'], ['Voice Options for your Chatbot', 'Adding Watson Speech Services'], ['Understanding Deployment Options', 'Deploying your Chatbot to Facebook Messenger', 'Deploying your Chatbot to Slack'], ['Conclusion & Next Steps']]
doc.reviews: ['Great course', 'worst course in the series ', 'Some really useful stuff but when it came to the technical bits there was little to no explanation - just a set of instructions ... "FOLLOW THIS"... "TYPE THIS" but no learning involved, just regurgitation.', 'Great for learning how to cut and paste. If the code actually worked it would be even better ...', 'Very disappointed by this course']
doc.reviewers: ['By Fadhel A A R A S', 'By Jay P', 'By Karim A', 'By David B', 'By Joe H']
